name: Army Base Rescue Mission - Transport the injured soldiers to the nearest Hospital in the Military Truck.
name_original: Army Base Rescue Mission - Transport the injured soldiers to the nearest Hospital in the Military Truck.
description:
The army base has been struck by a sudden attack by some terrorists. The onslaught has injured a lot of army soldiers, as they attempt to resist the army base from being taken over. Driving an army vehicle, your task is to transport the injured soldiers to the hospital.

Carrying out this rescue plan won’t be easy, as the terrorists have planted several land mines in your path. The terrorists also have a large army of tanks, soldiers and rocket launchers, hell bent on destroying your rescue vehicle. Show your driving skills and escape the army base, transporting the soldiers safely. The war is heating up, we need the rescue plan to work!

Army Base Rescue Mission is free to play. Download Now!


FEATURES

- Fast paced driving simulator for mobile
- 4 levels with various difficulties in each
- Avoid traffic, land mines and terrorist weaponry attacks
- Score high by transporting soldiers as fast as possible
- Pick up numerous power ups to keep the engine running


USE POWER UPS AND KEEP IT GOING
Keep your engine running, pick up fuel bags, gold bags, invincibility stars and nitrous kits to sway past the enemy attacks.


EXQUISITE DRIVING SIMULATOR GAMES PLAY
Experience the thrill of fast paced driving, drifting past heavy traffic and avoiding enemy attacks to reach destinations in the best possible time.
